price: Hii basi ndiyo Jahannamu mliyo kuwa mkiahidiwa.
footnotes: Wataambiwa: Hii ndiyo Jahannamu mliyo kuwa mkiahidiwa mlipo kuwa duniani. Ndiyo jaza ya ukafiri wenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
